name: LegendsOfPuzzles
description: Puzzle game, which is a mosaic that needs to be made up of many fragments of a picture of various shapes. It is one of the most affordable toys that develop logical thinking, attention, memory, and imagination. Such wonderful images are very useful for the development of thinking and cognitive abilities of a person. According to psychologists, playing puzzles promotes the development of imaginative and logical thinking, voluntary attention, perception, in particular, distinguishing individual elements by color, shape, size, etc.; teaches you to correctly perceive the connection between part and whole.
